Package com.intellij.xdebugger

Class XDebugProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.xdebugger.XDebugProcess
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaDebugProcess, PyDebugProcess, XsltDebugProcess

    public abstract class XDebugProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    Extends this class to provide debugging capabilities for custom language/framework. In order to start debugger by 'Debug' action for a specific run configuration implement ProgramRunner and call XDebuggerManager.startSession(com.intellij.execution.runners.ExecutionEnvironment, com.intellij.xdebugger.XDebugProcessStarter) from ProgramRunner.execute(ExecutionEnvironment) method Otherwise use method XDebuggerManager.startSessionAndShowTab(java.lang.String, com.intellij.execution.ui.RunContentDescriptor, com.intellij.xdebugger.XDebugProcessStarter) to start new debugging session

        public XBreakpointHandler<?> [] getBreakpointHandlers()
        Returns:
        breakpoint handlers which will be used to set/clear breakpoints in the underlying debugging process

      • getEditorsProvider

        public abstract XDebuggerEditorsProvider getEditorsProvider()
        Returns:
        editor provider which will be used to produce editors for "Evaluate" and "Set Value" actions

      • sessionInitialized

        public void sessionInitialized()
        Called when XDebugSession is initialized and breakpoints are registered in XBreakpointHandler

      • startPausing

        public void startPausing()
        Interrupt debugging process and call XDebugSession.positionReached(com.intellij.xdebugger.frame.XSuspendContext) when next line in current method/function is reached. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.pause() instead

      • startStepOver

        @Deprecated
public void startStepOver()
        Deprecated. Use startStepOver(XSuspendContext) instead

      • startStepOver

        public void startStepOver(XSuspendContext context)
        Resume execution and call XDebugSession.positionReached(com.intellij.xdebugger.frame.XSuspendContext) when next line in current method/function is reached. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.stepOver(boolean) instead

      • startForceStepInto

        @Deprecated
public void startForceStepInto()
        Deprecated. Use startForceStepInto(XSuspendContext) instead

      • startForceStepInto

        public void startForceStepInto(XSuspendContext context)
        Steps into suppressed call

        Resume execution and call XDebugSession.positionReached(com.intellij.xdebugger.frame.XSuspendContext) when next line is reached. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.forceStepInto() instead

public void startStepInto()
        Deprecated. Use startStepInto(XSuspendContext) instead

public void startStepOut()
        Deprecated. Use startStepOut(XSuspendContext) instead

      • startStepOut

        public void startStepOut(XSuspendContext context)
        Resume execution and call XDebugSession.positionReached(com.intellij.xdebugger.frame.XSuspendContext) after returning from current method/function. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.stepOut() instead

      • getSmartStepIntoHandler

        public XSmartStepIntoHandler<?> getSmartStepIntoHandler()
        Implement XSmartStepIntoHandler and return its instance from this method to enable Smart Step Into action
        Returns:
        XSmartStepIntoHandler instance

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop debugging and dispose resources. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.stop() instead

public void runToPosition(XSourcePosition position)
        Deprecated. Use runToPosition(XSourcePosition, XSuspendContext) instead

      • runToPosition

        public void runToPosition(XSourcePosition position,
                          XSuspendContext context)
        Resume execution and call XDebugSession.positionReached(XSuspendContext) when position is reached. Do not call this method directly. Use XDebugSession.runToPosition(com.intellij.xdebugger.XSourcePosition, boolean) instead
        Parameters:
        position - position in source code

      • checkCanPerformCommands

        public boolean checkCanPerformCommands()
        Check is it is possible to perform commands such as resume, step etc. And notify user if necessary
        Returns:
        true if process can actually perform user requests at this moment

      • checkCanInitBreakpoints

        public boolean checkCanInitBreakpoints()
        Check is it is possible to init breakpoints. Otherwise you should call XDebugSession.initBreakpoints() at the appropriate time
